message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take the low offer, or we'll go lower!
I'll give you a better deal, but don't get too greedy!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect much more!
You're running out of time, take it or leave it!
I'll give you a small bone, but I'm not getting desperate yet!
You're getting close to the edge, don't push me!
I'll give you a tiny piece, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're running out of time, take it before I take it all!
I'll give you a tiny crumb, but I'm not giving up the fight!
Last chance, take it or walk away with nothing!
